column1: #Text=Tenzin says : " Bumi and Korra , come with me to find the airbenders .
#Text=" Korra says : " I 'm the Avatar , and I 'm getting you all out of here .
#Text=You must stay calm and quiet if we want this to work .
#Text=" Korra says : " Yes , and we must leave now .
#Text=" Tenzin says : " We 're going to get you away from the Earth Queen and out of the city .
#Text=" Yung says : " There 's an airbender that 's not here .
#Text=" Tenzin says : " We 're already taking care of it .
#Text=" Bumi says : " Topside , this is Papa Bear .
#Text=The breezies are in the hold ; cue the balloons !
#Text=We 've got the airbenders and we 're headed out !
#Text=Asami and I are on our way .
#Text=Tenzin 's not gon na be happy about this !
#Text=" Mako says : " Then do n't tell him .
#Text=" Bolin says : " How can I not ?
#Text=" Kai says : " Thanks for coming to get me .
#Text=I 'm really sorry about stealing your wallets , and running away , and getting you stuck on that train .
#Text=" Bolin says : " We ca n't stay mad at you .
#Text=I had a lot of money in that wallet !
#Text=" Dai Li sergeant says : " Deserting Her Majesty 's army is high treason .
